resources.string: Emeza i konte yawe ya lichess.org, %s

string.name: emailConfirm_click
string.comment:
emailConfirm_click
Part of the confirmation email upon registering for a Lichess account.
The unique reset link is presented just after this string.

resources.string: Fyonda hano kugira wemeze i konte yawe ya lichess:
Nimba uta koresheje Lichess mukwiyandikisha, ubu butumwa bwihoze.
Subiriza akajambobanga ka konte yawe ya lichess.org, %s
Twaronse ubutumwa bwo gusubiriza akajambobanga ka konte yawe.
Nimba ariwe warungitse ubwo butumwa, fyonda aho musi. Atar\'uko, ubu butumwa bwihoze.
Kugira mwemeze kwi\'yi email ari gwanyu, fyonda aho musi:
